* Always Stealthy
* Starshell restrictions
* Armored Assault NA
* Riders NA
* Assault Engineers: WP grenades
* Leaders & Political Officers increase Morale  as if Commissar

* Infantry Platoon Movement

* Bugles

* Infantry Overrun NTC NA
